text: Pechino Express is the Italian TV version of the reality show Peking Express created by Ludo Poppe. It has been broadcast on Rai 2 since 2012. == Seasons == Season's number Season's subtitle Host Start End Continent Route Visited countries Distance 1 Avventura in Oriente Emanuele Filiberto di Savoia September 13, 2012 November 15, 2012 Asia , Haridwar , Beijing 7 900 km 2 Obiettivo Bangkok Costantino della Gherardesca September 8, 2013 November 4, 2013 , Hanoi , Bangkok 8 000 km 3 Ai confini dell'Asia Costantino della Gherardesca September 7, 2014 November 3, 2014 , Mandalay , Bali 4 Il nuovo mondo Costantino della Gherardesca September 7, 2015 November 2, 2015 America , Quito , Rio de Janeiro 5 Le civiltà perdute Costantino della Gherardesca September 12, 2016 November 14, 2016 , Bogotá , Mexico City 7 000 km 6 Verso il Sol Levante Costantino della Gherardesca September 13, 2017 November 15, 2017 Asia , Padre Burgos , Tokyo 6 000 km 7 Avventura in Africa Costantino della Gherardesca September 20, 2018 November 22, 2018 Africa , Tangier , Cape Town 15 000 km ==Ranking Positions== ===2012: Avventura in Oriente=== * First place: Alessandro Sampaoli & Debora Villa (Gli Attori) * Second place: Andrés Gil & Anastasia Kuzmina (I Ballerini) * Third place: Costantino della Gherardesca & Barù (Zio e Nipote) ===2013: Obiettivo Bangkok=== * First place: Massimiliano Rosolino & Marco Maddaloni (Gli Sportivi) * Second place: Francesca Fioretti & Ariadna Romero (Le Modelle) * Third place: Daniel Moreno Mendoza & Laura Caratelli (I Laureati) ===2014: Ai confini dell'Asia=== * First place: Stefano Corti & Alessandro Onnis (I Coinquilini) * Second place: Amaurys Perez & Angela Rende (I Pérez) * Third place: Eva Grimaldi & Roberta Garzia (Le Cougar) ===2015: Il nuovo mondo=== * First place: Antonio Andrea Pinna & Roberto Bertolini (Gli Antipodi) * Second place: Christian Kang Bachini & Son Pascal (Gli Espatriati) * Third place: Giulia Salemi & Fariba Mohammad Tehrani (Le Persiane) * Fourth place: Laura Forgia & Eleonora Cortini (Le Professoresse) ===2016: Le civiltà perdute=== * First place: Alessio Stigliano & Alessandro Tenace (I Socialisti) * Second place: Diego Passoni & Cristina Bugatty (I Contribuenti) ===2017: Verso il Sol Levante=== * First place: Ema Stokholma & Valentina Pegorer (Le Clubber) * Second place: Antonella Elia & Jill Cooper (Le Caporali) * Third place: Achille Lauro & Boss Doms (I Compositori) ===2018: Avventura in Africa=== * First place: Patrizia Rossetti & Maria Teresa Ruta (Le Signore della TV) * Second place: Fabrizio Colica & Tommy Kuti (Gli Scoppiati) * Third place: Rachele Fogar & Linda Morselli (Le Mannequin)
